body_html: I think it's related to the design of ScriptModule. the "training" flag is seen as a constant, so it cannot be changed after the module is built. I'm wondering how pytorch team will solve this problem.
body_text: I think it's related to the design of ScriptModule. the "training" flag is seen as a constant, so it cannot be changed after the module is built. I'm wondering how pytorch team will solve this problem.
body: I think it's related to the design of ScriptModule. the "training" flag is seen as a constant, so it cannot be changed after the module is built. I'm wondering how pytorch team will solve this problem.
